ResourceHeader.ResourceName: MAVEN SWEA Archive Rate Electron Pitch Angle Distributions Data Collection

RevisionEvent.Note: Draft metadata created by LFB (ADAPT code), final editing by AK

ResourceHeader.Description: MAVEN Solar Wind Electron Analyzer (SWEA) electron pitch angle distributions in units of differential energy flux (eV/cm^2 sec ster eV) at the MAVEN archive telemetry rate. Description of the SWEA instrument can be found on the SWEA home page https://lasp.colorado.edu/maven/science/instrument-package/swea/ and in the SWEA instrument publication https://doi.org/10.1007/s11214-015-0232-1.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the Principal Investigator David L. Mitchell for use of these data.

InformationURL.Name: MAVEN Data Archive at PDS PPI Node

AccessURL.Name: PDS PPI
AccessURL.Description: Access to Data in CDF Format at the Planetary Data System, Planetary Plasma Interactions node

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the Principal Investigator D. Larson

AccessURL.Name: FTPS from SPDF (not with most browsers)
AccessURL.Description: Access to Data in CDF Format via ftps from SPDF

AccessURL.Name: HTTPS from SPDF
AccessURL.Description: Access to Data in CDF Format via https from SPDF

AccessURL.Name: CDAWeb
AccessURL.Description: Access to ASCII, CDF, and Plots via NASA/GSFC CDAWeb

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the Principal Investigator David L. Mitchell. Please acknowledge the Data Providers and CDAWeb when using these data.

AccessURL.Name: CDAWeb HAPI Server
AccessURL.Description: Web Service to this product using the HAPI interface

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the Principal Investigator David L. Mitchell. Please also acknowledge the Data Providers and CDAWeb when using these data.

Parameter.Name: Time, center of sample, in TT2000 time base
Parameter.Description: Time, center of sample, in TT2000 time base
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression

Parameter.Name: Time, center of sample, in raw mission elapsed time
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Description: Time, center of sample, in raw mission elapsed time
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression

Parameter.Name: Time, center of sample, in Unix time
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Description: Time, center of sample, in Unix time
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression

Parameter.Name: Raw Instrument Counts (energy vs pitch angle index)
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch

Parameter.Name: Counts (movie: energy vs pitch angle index)
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: counts.

Parameter.Name: Counts (spectrograms at select energies)
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Description:
Counts (spectrograms at select energies).
* Column 1 Labels from PINDEX_ALT: ["Cnts @ AngIndx 0","Cnts @ AngIndx 1","Cnts @ AngIndx 2","Cnts @ AngIndx 3","Cnts @ AngIndx 4","Cnts @ AngIndx 5","Cnts @ AngIndx 6","Cnts @ AngIndx 7","Cnts @ AngIndx 8","Cnts @ AngIndx 9","Cnts @ AngIndx 10","Cnts @ AngIndx 11","Cnts @ AngIndx 12","Cnts @ AngIndx 13","Cnts @ AngIndx 14","Cnts @ AngIndx 15"]. * Column 2 Labels from ENERGY: ["Cnts @ E0","Cnts @ E1","Cnts @ E2","Cnts @ E3","Cnts @ E4","Cnts @ E5","Cnts @ E6","Cnts @ E7","Cnts @ E8","Cnts @ E9","Cnts @ E10","Cnts @ E11","Cnts @ E12","Cnts @ E13","Cnts @ E14","Cnts @ E15","Cnts @ E16","Cnts @ E17","Cnts @ E18","Cnts @ E19","Cnts @ E20","Cnts @ E21","Cnts @ E22","Cnts @ E23","Cnts @ E24","Cnts @ E25","Cnts @ E26","Cnts @ E27","Cnts @ E28","Cnts @ E29","Cnts @ E30","Cnts @ E31","Cnts @ E32","Cnts @ E33","Cnts @ E34","Cnts @ E35","Cnts @ E36","Cnts @ E37","Cnts @ E38","Cnts @ E39","Cnts @ E40","Cnts @ E41","Cnts @ E42","Cnts @ E43","Cnts @ E44","Cnts @ E45","Cnts @ E46","Cnts @ E47","Cnts @ E48","Cnts @ E49","Cnts @ E50","Cnts @ E51","Cnts @ E52","Cnts @ E53","Cnts @ E54","Cnts @ E55","Cnts @ E56","Cnts @ E57","Cnts @ E58","Cnts @ E59","Cnts @ E60","Cnts @ E61","Cnts @ E62","Cnts @ E63"].
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: counts.

Parameter.Name: Counts (spectrograms at select angle indices)
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Description:
Counts (spectrograms at select angle indices).
* Column 1 Labels from PINDEX_ALT: ["Cnts @ AngIndx 0","Cnts @ AngIndx 1","Cnts @ AngIndx 2","Cnts @ AngIndx 3","Cnts @ AngIndx 4","Cnts @ AngIndx 5","Cnts @ AngIndx 6","Cnts @ AngIndx 7","Cnts @ AngIndx 8","Cnts @ AngIndx 9","Cnts @ AngIndx 10","Cnts @ AngIndx 11","Cnts @ AngIndx 12","Cnts @ AngIndx 13","Cnts @ AngIndx 14","Cnts @ AngIndx 15"]. * Column 2 Labels from ENERGY: ["Cnts @ E0","Cnts @ E1","Cnts @ E2","Cnts @ E3","Cnts @ E4","Cnts @ E5","Cnts @ E6","Cnts @ E7","Cnts @ E8","Cnts @ E9","Cnts @ E10","Cnts @ E11","Cnts @ E12","Cnts @ E13","Cnts @ E14","Cnts @ E15","Cnts @ E16","Cnts @ E17","Cnts @ E18","Cnts @ E19","Cnts @ E20","Cnts @ E21","Cnts @ E22","Cnts @ E23","Cnts @ E24","Cnts @ E25","Cnts @ E26","Cnts @ E27","Cnts @ E28","Cnts @ E29","Cnts @ E30","Cnts @ E31","Cnts @ E32","Cnts @ E33","Cnts @ E34","Cnts @ E35","Cnts @ E36","Cnts @ E37","Cnts @ E38","Cnts @ E39","Cnts @ E40","Cnts @ E41","Cnts @ E42","Cnts @ E43","Cnts @ E44","Cnts @ E45","Cnts @ E46","Cnts @ E47","Cnts @ E48","Cnts @ E49","Cnts @ E50","Cnts @ E51","Cnts @ E52","Cnts @ E53","Cnts @ E54","Cnts @ E55","Cnts @ E56","Cnts @ E57","Cnts @ E58","Cnts @ E59","Cnts @ E60","Cnts @ E61","Cnts @ E62","Cnts @ E63"].

Parameter.Name: Calibrated differential energy flux (energy vs pitch angles for 158eV)
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch

* Column 1 Labels from PINDEX_ALT: ["PA @ AngIndx 0","PA @ AngIndx 1","PA @ AngIndx 2","PA @ AngIndx 3","PA @ AngIndx 4","PA @ AngIndx 5","PA @ AngIndx 6","PA @ AngIndx 7","PA @ AngIndx 8","PA @ AngIndx 9","PA @ AngIndx 10","PA @ AngIndx 11","PA @ AngIndx 12","PA @ AngIndx 13","PA @ AngIndx 14","PA @ AngIndx 15"]. * Column 2 Labels from ENERGY: ["PA @ E0","PA @ E1","PA @ E2","PA @ E3","PA @ E4","PA @ E5","PA @ E6","PA @ E7","PA @ E8","PA @ E9","PA @ E10","PA @ E11","PA @ E12","PA @ E13","PA @ E14","PA @ E15","PA @ E16","PA @ E17","PA @ E18","PA @ E19","PA @ E20","PA @ E21","PA @ E22","PA @ E23","PA @ E24","PA @ E25","PA @ E26","PA @ E27","PA @ E28","PA @ E29","PA @ E30","PA @ E31","PA @ E32","PA @ E33","PA @ E34","PA @ E35","PA @ E36","PA @ E37","PA @ E38","PA @ E39","PA @ E40","PA @ E41","PA @ E42","PA @ E43","PA @ E44","PA @ E45","PA @ E46","PA @ E47","PA @ E48","PA @ E49","PA @ E50","PA @ E51","PA @ E52","PA @ E53","PA @ E54","PA @ E55","PA @ E56","PA @ E57","PA @ E58","PA @ E59","PA @ E60","PA @ E61","PA @ E62","PA @ E63"].
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: pa.
